arponr

About

I’m Arpon Raksit, an undergraduate at Harvard. I’m mostly focused on trying to understand (parts of) math. This site is basically a place for me to blog short snippets, and keep some longer expository notes, on the subject.

“it always turned out that understanding was all that mattered”
— A. Grothendieck

I’m nearly always distracted by design, music, programming, running, tennis, or tv. This place is also an outlet for these things—I might occasionally post about them, and I’m constantly redesigning the site for no reason.

Contact me at arpon.raksit@gmail.com.
